items.name: Item: Free Writing
items.instructions: Write about the topic below. Try to use all of the keywords from this lesson.
items.text: Write about what you would do if you lost something important, like your house key. Use words like pocket, drop, search, and police in your answer.
items.aigradefeedbacklanguage: Thank you for your response. Remember to check your grammar and try to use the keywords provided.
items.aigradeinstructions: Penalize 1 mark for each grammar mistake. Award 1 mark for each use of the keywords: house key, pocket, drop, search, police.
